title: Buying A Badminton Racket in Singapore: The Ultimate Guide
content:
Badminton is one of the most popular sports in Singapore. With the rise in popularity in badminton, the demand for badminton shops is increasing. With the variety of badminton shops available in Singapore, there is confusion on where to start finding the right badminton racket. We will be showcasing the ultimate guide of buying a badminton racket in this article!

In Singapore, prices of Badminton rackets are higher when compared to other Asian countries. The cheapest Badminton racket you can get is $30. Mid Badminton rackets range around $80-$120, while high end Yonex rackets can reach up to $350! The prices here obviously reflect the quality of the rackets. 

![](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/woman-chooses-badminton-racquet-shop-sport-52148421.jpg)

The go-to place for Badminton racket shopping is Queensway Shopping Centre. With shops like Gala Sports, Sports Finesse and Transworld Sports, Badminton enthusiasts are given a diverse  lineup of Badminton rackets to choose from. Brands range from Dunlop, Li-Ning to the fan-favourite, Yonex. Some might say that Queensway Shopping Centre is the Badminton racket heaven for players. Pro-tip: You can also bargain with the shop teller here for the best prices! 

![](https://media.timeout.com/images/103376376/image.jpg)

In the event you are looking for a complete set of Badminton equipment, you can also check out Decathlon! They provide a great selection of Badminton gear such as Badminton nets, shuttlecocks, apparel and more! Decathlon provides badminton rackets suitable for beginners, intermediate and advanced players. Therefore, you can get a badminton as cheap as $10 for a beginner Badminton racket or a $105 advanced Badminton racket. The variation of rackets provide players a flexible way of choosing their gear. Decathlon also has testing and showroom zones where you can try out the various products before buying.

![](https://insideretail.asia/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Decathlon-7.jpg)

Another one stop badminton store is SinTec Sportscity. Not only does it sell and distribute quality sports equipment, it also provides professional badminton coaching services to their customers. Their objective is to contribute the effort in helping Singapore to achieve greater height in the international sports arena. They provide brands such as Victor, Yonex and Li- Ning. Their shops are also widely accessible as they have 4 different outlets in Bedok North, Tampines Central, Jurong East and Anchorvale Road. 

![](https://nestia-food.obs.ap-southeast-3.myhuaweicloud.com/201612/07/21a969489d85786cb04d0d4be928b348.jpg)



With the information and knowledge provided in this article, you are now ready to go on a Badminton racket hunt!
